name: Low Rez Arena
description:
Controls: Arrow keys, X and Z. Controller and touchscreen support.

Enter the Arena Eternal and frag your way to victory in this turn-based tribute to Quake 3 Arena.

•Dice-based combat
•Chiptune music inspired by the Quake series
•Over 20 characters from Quake 3
•Secret unlockables

This game was made for LOWREZJAM 2022 from 1st August-14th August.
